history.content:
FEMTech Berkeley is recruiting for Spring 2022! 

 

What we do: Through FEMHacks, our annual hackathon for female and non-binary students from underrepresented minorities, organized seminars, mentorship programs, training workshops, networking events, and consulting for minority-led companies, FEMTech at Berkeley aims to provide a supportive community for students of all majors and backgrounds to create meaningful connections with like-minded people. We hope to excite new interest in tech and provide support for female and underrepresented students pursuing a career in the tech industry. Our mission is to empower and inspire students and we welcome anyone and everyone who supports FEMTech’s mission. 

 

Next Steps:

Facebook Event

Infosession 2 - Thursday 1/27/2022, 8-9pm PST, Zoom Link

Intern applications due - Saturday 1/29/22, 11:59pm PST, Application link

Interviews - Wednesday 2/2/22-2/3/22

Decisions Released - Saturday 2/5/22

General Member Interest Form

 

Follow us on Social Media to stay updated!

Instagram: @femtechberkeley

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FEMTechBerkeley

Join Slack: https://tinyurl.com/femtechslack

Feel free to dm us on instagram if you have any questions!
